altername_name: Shin Nippon Pro Wrestling: Toukon Retsuden
name: Shin Nihon Pro Wrestling: Toukon Retsuden
overview: Straight from the National Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW) come the greatest wrestlers of the Land of the Rising Sun; beware the Thunder Lyger! Shin Nihon Pro Wrestling Toukon Retsuden is a simple wrestling game where the player takes control of one of six wrestlers, who were current figures at the time of the games publication. Random battles can be arranged or competition in a tournament against all the games wrestlers.
